title: I CANT CONNECT TO THE  GAME
body: My game crashed during loading screen and i trying to reconnect to the game but the game crashed again,what should i do now?

replies.body: Which specific error message are you seeing? Are you sure it's not caused by the known issue listed in the client (Button next to Home) or on the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)?

It's the one where you get the error reporting window pop up and you can choose to send report or dont, and you can view error report. 

Clicking either send or dont send gets you back to screen where reconnect button is shown. Clicking the button attempts to reconnect but then you get the error reporting window again because you can't connect to game.
same thing is happening to me
